C F G M O R S Z

C

Controller - class com.yourkit.api.Controller.
The class provides API to control profiling of Java applications.
Controller() - Constructor for class com.yourkit.api.Controller
Creates a contoller to profile application itself, i.e. to profile the JVM running the code that invokes this constructor.
Controller(String, int) - Constructor for class com.yourkit.api.Controller
Creates a contoller to profile remote application given host it is running and the port its profiler agent listens to.
captureCPUSnapshot(String, boolean) - Method in class com.yourkit.api.Controller
Captures CPU snapshot.
captureCPUSnapshot(String, int, String, boolean) - Method in class com.yourkit.api.Controller
Deprecated. Use Controller.Controller(String, int) and Controller.captureCPUSnapshot(String, boolean) instead
captureMemorySnapshot(String, boolean) - Method in class com.yourkit.api.Controller
Captures memory snapshot.
captureMemorySnapshot(String, int, String, boolean) - Method in class com.yourkit.api.Controller
Deprecated. Use Controller.Controller(String, int) and Controller.captureMemorySnapshot(String, boolean) instead

G

getObjectCount(String) - Method in class com.yourkit.api.MemorySnapshot
Calculates number of objects that correspond to the given description.
getShallowSize(String) - Method in class com.yourkit.api.MemorySnapshot
Calculates shallow size of objects that correspond to the given description.

M

MemorySnapshot - class com.yourkit.api.MemorySnapshot.
The class supports analysis of captured memory snapshots.
MemorySnapshot(File, ObfuscatorType, File) - Constructor for class com.yourkit.api.MemorySnapshot
Loads memory snapshot for analysis.

O
